mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports(reporter_id, target_type, target_id, reason, status) VALUES (#{reporterId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{reason}, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.id) FROM reports r WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'PENDING';
SELECT COUNT(r.id) FROM reports r WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'REVIEWING';
SELECT COUNT(r.id) FROM reports r WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'RESOLVED';
